GOAL:  Implement the task data model and localStorage persistence layer.

- Create data model for tasks (id, text, completed, createdAt)
- Implement function to generate unique IDs
- Implement function to save tasks to localStorage
- Implement function to load tasks from localStorage
- Add error handling for localStorage unavailability

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Tasks are stored in localStorage under a consistent key
- Each task has: unique id, text content, completed boolean, creation timestamp
- Tasks persist after page refresh
- Tasks load correctly when page opens
- If localStorage is unavailable, an error message is displayed to user
- Tasks maintain their creation order when loaded
